skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 20.5 and decreases received Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Shield Mastery
skills.Description: Increases Shield Defense by 30% and Defense Rate by 50%.

skills.Name: Arrest
skills.Description: Provokes the enemy to attack dealing 50 Physical Damage, immobilizing them for 4 seconds and regains 15%% MP.

skills.Name: Superior Aggression
skills.Description: Provokes the target to attack with 6600 Power.

skills.Name: Knight Slash
skills.Description: You swing your weapon in a heroic slash, dealing 275 physical damage. Requires a sword, blunt, or dual weapon. Over-hit is possible.

skills.Name: Drain Energy
skills.Description: Rips the energies out of the target with 52 Dark Magical Power and regain HP.

skills.Name: Sting
skills.Description: Stabs the target in the gut, dealing 200 P. Atk and decreasing the enemy's movement speed by 40% for 8 seconds, inflicts bleed, and does damage of 47HP every second. Requires a sword, dagger, duals, or dual-dagger. Over-hit is possible.

skills.Name: Ultimate Defense
skills.Description: For 30 seconds., increases P. Def. by 1800, M. Def. by 1620, and Buff-canceling Attack Resistance by 80%, and restricts movement.
